attributes.action: Stay true to Democracy and reject the petition for a second referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
Over 17 million people voted to leave the undemocratic organisation of the EU, democracy spoken that day when over 17 million people voted to leave the European Union.
As we know parliament are due to sit and debates a petition for a second referendum, Vote remain a struggling to come to terms with democracy. I feel deeply concerned that if government agree to a second referendum this is going to deface democracy and create anger and possibly riots across Great Britain. Democracy is Britain.
attributes.background: Parliament are due to debate about a possible second referendum, in doing so this is going against democracy. Democracy is Britain and we need to acknowledge that the British people have spoken and we should leave the European Union and Trigger article 50. I am calling for the government to reject.
